NightLight::

She stopped and turned. "Aerotaur, we need reenforcements."
She opened her commlink. "Any maximal that can hear me. We need your help. 
We have children that are in danger and need your help. Come quickly."  With 
her message sent, she ran back in to assist Aerotaur.


------original message---------
>::Windlord::
>     He fired another 25 shots at BH.
>
>::Aerotaur::
>     He ran out of the base after Nightlight.  "Nightlight?  I thought you
>were feeling ill?"  He spots the standoff between Windlord and Burning 
>Hammer
>when something occurs to him.  "HEY ASSASSIN!  You remember that femme bot
>you came with before?  We've got her locked up so deep in the base you'll
>never find her unless you let Trinity go.  Now!"
